name: Vortex Pair Warp
description:
vanilla js/glsl remake of the transform shader from http://www.cake23.de/uno.beta/LaminarFlow2/ in combination with http://webglplayground.net/share/organic-net?gallery=1&fullscreen=0&width=800&height=600&header=1 and a new composite shader.

The Turing Pattern only consumes a single color channel. View the source, hit alt+a and ctrl+v, add to fs-advance and fs-composite
